pages.text: Reinforced with wildwood, this quiver has the ability to augment normal arrows or even grow arrows from itself, at the cost of durability.$(br2)It can even consume arrows stuck into the ground nearby, if you get close enough and can obtain the proper leverage, although arrows may break in the process.

However, it cannot consume any arrows grown of itself, and the process damages any augments the arrow may have had, returning it to its basic form.$(br2)The natural magic infused in this quiver allow it to repair itself, like other living tools, but at a much reduced rate.
